title: All projects of public interest undertaken by Central and State Government bodies or Public Authorities controlled by the Government
clause_text: All projects of public interest undertaken by Central and State Government bodies or Public Authorities controlled by the Government. Plantations / Afforestation shall not be permitted. Any activity restricting / obstructing Natural water flows shall not be permitted. New man made water bodies as well as expansion of existing water bodies shall not be permitted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: All projects of public interest undertaken by Central and State Government bodies or Public Authorities controlled by the Government.
